players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed his role. We need to vote him out immediately."
Diana: "Alice, that's a bold claim. Bob, what do you say in your defense?"
Diana: "Alice, why did you investigate Bob last night? That could help us decide."
You: "I investigated Bob because he was acting suspicious during our initial setup discussion, and my instincts were right - he's the mafioso who killed Charlie last night."
Bob: "Alice, you're lying about investigating me—there was no initial discussion where I acted suspicious. I think you're the mafioso trying to frame me. Vote for Alice instead."
